songs.title: Touch (Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Leigh-Anne Pinnock & Kid Ink]
You and I and nobody else (Ah-yeah)
Feeling feelings I've never felt (It's Kid Ink!)
The way you got me under your spell
Don't you keep it all to yourself

[Pre-Chorus: Perrie Edwards & Kid Ink]
So, won't you take it?
I feel like for the first time I am not faking (Hey!)
Fingers on my buttons and now you're playing
Master of anticipation, don't you keep it all to yourself (Woo!)

[Chorus: All & Kid Ink]
Just a touch of your love is enough
To knock me off of my feet all week
Just a touch of your love, oh
Just a touch of your love, oh
Just a touch of your love is enough
To take control of my whole body
Just a touch of your love, oh
Just a touch of your love, oh (Oh!)
Just a touch of your love is enough
To knock me off of my feet, all week
Just a touch of your love, oh
Just a touch of your love, oh
Just a touch of your love is enough
To take control of my whole body
Just a touch of your love, oh
Just a touch of your love, oh

[Verse 2: Jesy Nelson & All]
Photograph with no T-shirt on
Why you making me wait so long? (Wait so long?)
I promise to keep this a secret, I'll never tell
But don't you keep it all to yourself

[Pre-Chorus: Jade Thirlwall & Kid Ink]
So won't you take it? (Hey!)
I feel like for the first time I am not faking (Hey!)
Fingers on my buttons and now you're playing (Yeah)
Master of anticipation, don't you keep it all to yourself, to yourself

[Chorus: All, Perrie Edwards, Kid Ink & Jesy Nelson]
To knock me off of my feet all week (Knock me off my feet)
Just a touch of your love, oh (Oh-oh-oh-oh)
Just a touch of your love, oh (Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh, just a touch, now)
Just a touch of your love is enough
To take control of my whole body (Body)
Just a touch of your love (Your love, babe), oh
Just a touch of your love, hey (Yeah, it's Kid Ink!)

[Verse 3: Kid Ink]
There ain't no need to rush
We gon' be up all night 'til the day come
You say you need just a touch
But you know I got a lot more where that came from
Back up, back up, that thang, girl
Roll up I got that flame, girl (Oh)
I'ma keep doing the same, like that
If you keep touchin' my chain, like that (Uh)

[Bridge: Kid Ink]
You know I've been unfair, tryna wash my hands
I just need to hold it, baby, let me show ya

[Chorus: All, Perrie Edwards, Jesy Nelson, Leigh-Anne Pinnock & (Jade Thirlwall)]
Just a touch of your love is enough
To knock me off of my feet all week (Off my feet)
Just a touch of your love, oh (Hey)
Just a touch of your love, oh (Just a touch, your love)
Just a touch of your love is enough
To take control of my whole body (Body)
Just a touch of your love, oh (Only a touch of your love)
Just a touch of your love, oh (One touch of your—!)
(Oh) Just a touch of your love is enough
To knock me off of my feet, all week (Knock me off of my feet, all week)
Just a touch of your love (Just a touch)
Just a touch of your love (Just a touch)
Just a touch of your love is enough
To take control of my whole body (Oh, woah, yeah-ey)
Just a touch of your love, hey!
Just a touch of your love (Just a touch of your love), oh!
